title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: April 26, 2023, 03:33:35 AMLast edit: June 05, 2023, 03:54:15 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: This is a group buy that will be combined with a pre-sale being done directly on Daren Markets for 2 variations of a co-branded wallet. One being the standard stainless steel wallet with custom co-branded logo and custom sleeve and a gold plated card coming in the larger packaging with the custom sleeve and thicker magnetic acrylic case.gold plated and packaging (similar packaging to the gold bull/tiger/rabbit wallets)there is also chance of airdrop of their NFT to random wallet addresses (gold versions have increased chance)PRICEPrice for the Stainless Steel wallet is $42Price for the Gold Plated wallet is $109PAYMENT ADDRESSbc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esplease put your request as follow:1 gold plated, 3 stainless steel - MoparMiningLLCreference links:Twitter PostDaren Markets Stainless Steel BalletDaren Markets Gold Plated Ballet

comments.body: received an update - the golds have not gotten anywhere close to MOQ - so I will be removing those as they will not be made. That said, we have jointly reached the MOQ for the Stainless so I will add a payment address to OP and please send payment by June 7thplease send pymt and dm me your txn id or post it here.
